entry.content:

Jan 13, 15:12 UTC

entry.title: [Global][Network] - Modem : ACS Incident notification
entry.content:
Jan 15, 16:47 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.

Here is detail for the incident :
Start time : 14/01/2025 23:00 UTC
End time : 15/01/2025 15:41 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a software issue.

Customers affected by this incident will be connected automatically, otherwise, a reboot will be necessary.
We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

Jan 15, 10:22 UTC
Identified - An incident is in progress on our Network in Global, customers in the impacted zone may face some difficulties. Please find the details:
Start time : 14/01/2025 23:00 UTC
Service impact : customers may experience problems connecting to the autoconfiguration servers (ACS) xDSL / FTTH modem
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.

We will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.
We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [BHS4/BHS5/BHS6/BHS7][Infrastructure] - Electrical background work
entry.content:
Jan 15, 13:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Dec 5, 10:31 UTC
Update - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

Dec 3, 19:12 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our electrical infrastructure.

Start time : 15/01/2025 13:00 UTC
End time : 15/01/2025 17:00 UTC
Service impact : You may experience a downtime of up to 20 minutes for each intervention.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy, we are doing some preventive electrical background work.
We have carefully planned and scheduled the interventions to minimize any potential impact on your services.

The maintenance schedule is as follows:
BHS4 : Start of intervention at 13:00 UTC

  • (Rooms at risk : T04A, T04B and T04C )

BHS5 : Start of intervention at 13:45 UTC
  • (Rooms at risk : T05A, T05B, T05C, T05D, T05E, T05F, T05G and T05H)

BHS6 : Start of intervention at 15:00 UTC
  • (Rooms at risk : T06B, T06C, T06D, T06E, T06F and T06G)

BHS7(first part) : Start of intervention at 15:45 UTC
  • (Rooms at risk : B702, B703, B707 and B709)

BHS7(second part) : Start of intervention at 16:30 UTC
  • (Rooms at risk : B710 and B716)


Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [RBX3][Infrastructure] - Room 41
